name: unflare

scripts.test:demo: npm run build & cd test*/test* & npm run test
scripts.test:demo:once: npm run build & cd test*/test* & npm run test:once
scripts.test:demo:ci: npm run build:first & cd test*/test* & npm install & npm run test:once
scripts.test:ci: npm install & npm run test:once & npm run test:demo:ci

author: Jephthah M. Orobia <jephthah.orobia@gmail.com> (https://jephthah-orobia.github.io/)
description: Just another express-inspired web framework for cloudflare's workers.
